Input Question: Which BW team members will help you with this event?
Can you tell me a rough agenda of the entire time? (team flies in, meetings next day, team flies home, etc)
Do you know of any dietary/accessibility needs?
What is the plan for food (be specific: snacks, meals during meeting time or offsite, grab-go-lunch)
Do you have a prefered layout for the room (classroom, round tables, etc)?
Do we need a registration or check-in table near the entrance?
Will you need supplies (name tags, pens, sticky notes, etc)?
